title: [Health] ER doctors in the US have incentives to be out of network because patients do not usually "choose" their doctor when they go to the ER. In 2014, NY became the first state to introduce reforms aimed at limiting the ability to bill out of network. It successfully reduced out-of-network billing by 88%.

[Health] Emergency visits for acute respiratory illness increase in the days before major thunderstorms, particularly for people with asthma or COPD. This is likely due to increases in temperature and airborne particulate matter concentration.
